title: Slow connections in ATL region
customer_symptom: Users reported sluggish apps and choppy calls.
findings: Network delay spiked on a primary path. A backup path remained healthy, suggesting a single route issue rather than a full outage.
mitigation: Traffic was shifted away from the degraded path. Performance returned to normal and stayed stable.

timeline.event: Alert triggered for unusual network delay.
Confirmed customer impact in the ATL region.
Identified the degraded path as the most likely cause.
Shifted traffic away from the degraded path.
Delay stabilized and incident was marked resolved.

title: Choppy audio during conference calls
customer_symptom: Calls sounded robotic or cut out for some participants.
impact: Real-time traffic quality degraded for a noticeable portion of sessions.
findings: Dropped traffic increased during the window and aligned with a network event. Non-real-time traffic was less affected.
mitigation: Adjusted routing preference to avoid the affected segment and kept a tighter watch on drop rate thresholds.

timeline.event: Alert triggered for degraded call quality indicators.

Adjusted routing preference away from the segment.
